_comment: Weather configuration for ESP32 Photo Frame
_instructions: Copy this file as 'weather.json' to your SD card and update the settings
_setup_instructions: 1. Set 'enabled' to true to activate weather display
2. Update 'latitude' and 'longitude' with your location coordinates
4. Choose your preferred units for temperature, wind speed, and precipitation
5. Copy this file as 'weather.json' to the root of your SD card
6. Restart your photo frame to load the new configuration
